name: Robo Fix-IT
description:
The computers all around the world have all shut down and amidst the screams of the innocent users, a team of two robots offered themselves to get to the root of the problem and fix everything. How? By getting into the root of the system!!!

You and your other robot friend's task is to navigate through a labyrinth of circuits by rotating the circuits and delivering the correct chips to each terminal!

Instructions:

This is a co-op game where both players play on one keyboard split-screen. One of you must rotate the circuits and the other has to move through them and collect/deliver the chips to the terminals.

The chips have to be picked up in the correct order. You must first reach the center of the circuit to find out the correct chip order. After picking up a chip, you have to deliver it to the terminal.

Controls:

Player 1 ( Circuit Rotater )

M - Rotate Right

N - Rotate Left

R - Move to the upper circle

F - Move to the lower circle

Player 2 ( Circuit Navigator )

WASD - Move

Space Bar - Jump

E - Pick/Deliver Chips

This game was created for the Global Game Jam of 2023 with the theme of "Roots". Our team is part of the student association GameDev Técnico.

Artists:

Ivo Duarte ( WorldSeed )

João Lopes ( Draike )

Programmers:

André Antunes ( Antunes10 )
